mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video_comments (comment_id, user_num, video_id, parent_comment_id, comment_content, likes, dislikes, created_at) VALUES (video_comments_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userNum}, #{videoId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{commentContent}, #{likes}, #{dislikes}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT comment_id AS commentId, user_num AS userNum, video_id AS videoId, parent_comment_id AS parentCommentId, comment_content AS commentContent, likes, dislikes, created_at AS createdAt FROM video_comments WHERE video_id = #{videoId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
